newslog.content: Jake Summer has a composed fracture and he’s gonna be out of the field for 4 months.
Chris Greyson, a new Left Guard from New York City has joined the team!
Nicholas Grissom, a new Right Guard from Washington has joined the team!
Tom Baratheon left the team after 4 years in the club and his new house are the Draconians.
The Alchemists are the new West League Champions after a difficult final against the Lucky Clovers.

changelog.content: Chris Greyson, a new Left Guard from New York City has joined the team!
Nicholas Grissom, a new Right Guard from Washington has joined the team!
Tom Baratheon left the team after 4 years in the club and his new house are the Draconians
Malcolm Rowe, a new Defensive Tackle from Austin has joined the team!
Remy Lebeau, a new Linebacker from Portland has joined the team!
Patrick McCoy, a new Right Cornerback from New York City has joined the team!
Vincent Lothbrok, a new Safety from New Jersey has joined the team!
Max Stanfield left the team after 1 year in the club and his new house are the Sharks
Daniel Storm left the team after 2 years in the club and his new house are the L.A. Pirates
Christopher Dax, a new Left Defensive End from Malibu has joined the team!
Robert Payne, a new Long Snapper from Washington has joined the team!

desc.label: Team Bio:
desc.value: Based in California, and founded by Faye Spiegel “The Game Huntress”,  The Alchemists L.O. Heroes ended up being one of the strongests teams in the world.

newslog.content: Steven Masterson has a composed fracture and he’s gonna be out of the field for 4 months.
Steven Masterson has a lower back contusion and will miss the next two games.
Steven Masterson, is now 1st Quarterback after being 3rd Quaterback for the past year.
Steven Masterson has problem with his abductor and will need a small surgery.
Steven Masterson won the Player of the Year 2012 Award for the first time.
Steven Masterson has joined the team after playing for the Hammerheads for a year.

newslog.content: Jenny Thomps is now the new Team Recruiter for the East Coast Colleges.
Robert Frankson will have a surgery and will be out for a month. Interim coach will be Frank Roberts.
Max Stevens is now the 2nd Team Doctor after a succesfull run in the Sharks.
Tommy Flankers left the team after 2 years as the 2nd Team Doctor.
Patrick Storm is now the new Team Recruiter for the West Coast Colleges.
Alexa Polson is now the new Athletic Trainer after a succesfull run in the Pirates.
Savannah Lavender is the new Team Nutritionist with more than 500.000 followers.
